pv26:9.1: Sātunnavasanā → sāhunnavāsino (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sāhunnavasanā (pts-vp-pli2ed) | sāhundavāsino (mr)
pv26:11.1: pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed), papatitā → papatitvā (bj) | ca patitā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
pv26:20.3: Bījitaṅgā → vījitaṅgā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | vijitaṅgā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
